channel.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
channel.description:
Source and gldsrc's biggest advantage is also their biggest disadvantage when it comes to deathmatch; extremely easy customization leads to a flood of shitty modded servers running shitty custom made maps with a gig of shitty custom .wav files. This is such a problem that on HLDM and HL2DM it is no longer possible to find a server running good ol' simple deathmatch on good ol' commercially made maps. /rant
So my question is, when blackmesa is released do you think the dm mode be completely ruined by badly made maps running badly made mods that force you to dl gigs of absolutely useless .wav files?
This worries me a lot because if BlackemsaDM lives up to it's old counterpart it will be the best multiplayer ever made and it could be very easily ruined by bad modders.

item.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
av3nger:

And it isn’t the quake 3 announcer. The idiot who made Mani_Admin_scripts named it quake sounds when really only 2 or so files are quake ones and the rest are Unreal Tournament. It pisses me off that he’s tricked so many people because I’ve played UT since I was six. Started with Unreal Tournament 1.

My life has been a complete lie, I never played Quake or UT but I was thinking they were from Quake …

item.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

Of course. Like any game on source, it will probably run just about any map with the .bsp extension.

Though, you must be some kind of a stupid person, if you want to play retail maps, join a server that plays them/runs with sv_pure 1. How hard is that!

I can go into HL2DM right now and join a server running with zero modification whatsoever, except I wouldn’t do that because I don’t hate custom maps or the Quake 3 announcer for some mysterious reason.

And it isn’t the quake 3 announcer. The idiot who made Mani_Admin_scripts named it quake sounds when really only 2 or so files are quake ones and the rest are Unreal Tournament. It pisses me off that he’s tricked so many people because I’ve played UT since I was six. Started with Unreal Tournament 1.

Yes, the reply is extremely late but I don’t care.

Read full topic

item.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Dias:

I know there’s a fair deal of hate towards the gravity gun in deathmatch at least, but just out of curiosity, would it help if there was a slight handicap? Possibly a slower rate of fire, or inability to sprint while holding props?

That’s one of the things I always thinked, inability to sprint while holding props. Hell is not funny when a guy who has a freggin object of the size of a car is going after you while sprinting and using the object as shield at the same time he throws it to you…

Read full topic

item.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
mechaelite:

Is just it does not fire bullets or explosives, that’s why I think is a little fail, for me a gun is something that kills without needing any nearly object to be shoot.

Well, It can launch explosive barrels, among other things. To me it’s like a crossbow without a scope, and a larger variety of ammo, which it can also pull to you.

mechaelite:

But of course, is just my opinion and yes, I did a lot of grammar faults on a lot of posts before

Think nothing of it, I’m just heckling you. I applaud your humility. :freeman:

I know there’s a fair deal of hate towards the gravity gun in deathmatch at least, but just out of curiosity, would it help if there was a slight handicap? Possibly a slower rate of fire, or inability to sprint while holding props?

item.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
The purpose of the Gravity Gun is to get players to use their surroundings to their advantage, not by taking cover or other orthodox means, but by sucking up shit and punting it at people with deadly force.

There’s a reason the only item in the Valve store pertaining to HL2DM is a t-shirt with a picture of man getting his head caved in by a flying toilet bowl. It’s iconic to the franchise.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?

item.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Dias:

If you hate the Gravity gun because the props do too much damage, then why is it you like the magnum? It does a ton of damage, is instant, can’t be caught or deflected, has a very long range, & doesn’t obstruct your screen at all when using it. If anything, that sounds like the cheaper weapon.

Is just it does not fire bullets or explosives, that’s why I think is a little fail, for me a gun is something that kills without needing any nearly object to be shoot. But of course, is just my opinion and yes, I did a lot of grammar faults on a lot of posts before

Read full topic

item.source: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?

item.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
You’re not fooling anyone, and you’re only making yourself look dumber by pretending it was all a part of some plan or some shit like that.

mechaelite:

Anyways, will the BMDM have a grav. gun? 'cause BM will not and it makes me slightly doubt to see[/SIZE] a barrel kicking my ass on BMDM.

mechaelite:

Anyways, I wanted to be sure to see no barrels[/SIZE] kicking my ass.

mechaelite:

the old hal-life[/SIZE] deathmatch, Shooting the enemies 'til ran out[/SIZE] of ammo.

mechaelite:

Go on rage and try to kill the guy who throwed[/SIZE] you those objects
Go on another rage but this time with the grav gun to catch all the object he throws.[/SIZE]
Get killed by the .357 of the guy who throwed[/SIZE] you those objects.

mechaelite:

Is not because[/SIZE] I don’t know to use it, I hate it because it broke the old good times, I loved see people[/SIZE] shooting between themselves instead of throwing objects. What part of First Person Sooter is throw an object?[/SIZE]

mechaelite:

yeah it get’s fired by the grav gun but stills being an object.[/SIZE] That’s why, for me, hl2dm is broken there[/SIZE] are just some guys who will only throw objects to you because it’s an insta kill. For that I would use my .357 on the head wich is also an insta kill no a stupid barrel[/SIZE] breaking your skull…

mechaelite:

In other words: I hate see people throwing shits[/SIZE] to other people instead of shoot[/SIZE] with REAL weapons and not a shitty gravity gun.

More shitty grammar than spelling, but you get the idea.

If you hate the Gravity gun because the props do too much damage, then why is it you like the magnum? It does a ton of damage, is instant, can’t be caught or deflected, has a very long range, & doesn’t obstruct your screen at all when using it. If anything, that sounds like the cheaper weapon.

Read full topic

item.description:
Dias:

Seeing as how most of your posts are filled to the brim with typos, I highly, highly doubt that.

Nah, I was serious I wanted to see if some1 noticed this time. That’s why I thinked this _ would be better than this [COLOR=‘Red’]colour… Did I think bad?

Read full topic

item.source: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?

item.title: Will Blackmesa DM be ruined by modders?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
mechaelite:

Is not because I don’t know to use it, I hate it because it broke the old good times, I loved see people shooting between themselves instead of throwing objects.

I.E. Because you want it to be as unoriginal as the vast majority of first person shooters.

mechaelite:

What part of First Person Sooter is throw an object?

Physics Cannon, as in a cannon that uses physics to shoot things. A handgun is a miniaturized cannon, a gravity gun is a large scale cannon.

What part of First Person Shooter is beat-people-in-the-face-with-a-crowbar?

mechaelite:

That’s why, for me, hl2dm is broken there are just some guys who will only throw objects to you because it’s an insta kill. For that I would use my .357 on the head wich is also an insta kill no a stupid barrel breaking your skull…

Ok, you don’t like it because it’s too powerful & you get killed by it too often, yet you like a weapon that’s just as powerful, if not easier to use. What does that sound like to you?

mechaelite:

I kno funny uh? I wanted to see if anyone noticed.

Seeing as how most of your posts are filled to the brim with typos, I highly, highly doubt that.

Read full topic
